Message.Title: One Two You are out

Topic.Title: QCOM declined significantly on leaked information

Message.Msg: the world does sound simplistic to somebody who has hidden agenda. both qcom and samsung will be under seize in less than a month. Right now, qocm and samsung probably owns the feature phone market either in terms of components or for phones. In July, aapl will be bringing out a lower priced phone to attack the feature phone market. If that is a success, it will take a bite out of qcom and sammie's revenue streams. btw, you are so nice to worry about brcm all the time, but no need. brcm supplies shovels and couldn't care less who wins or loses this battle. As long as the competition broadens the market and drives the volume up, brcm gets more revenue. T3i would be ideal for this fight, but too bad it is so late, non ibey? wrong chips attacking wrong markets at all the wrong times, ibey, does nvda got a strategic market department?
